name: Bleeding Knife
description: Bleeding Knife is a classic horror game based on exploration, puzzle solving and story-telling. You will have to search for items and pick the right choices to be able to make it to the end of the game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 320 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i7 or better Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 Ti DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 320 MB available space
